PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-06782018-06-01,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectKinder Morgan Canada Inc. ** Selling Assets **
PrecisOrder authorizing KINDER MORGAN CANADA INC. and any of its subsidiaries or its successors, to sell or otherwise dispose of all or substantially all of its assets if Kinder Morgan Canada Inc. becomes a wholly-owned subsidiary of 10804142 CANADA INC.
AttachmentsAttachment
